## IKeyProvider.publicKey() method

gets public key by key id

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyID | [KmsKeyId](./js-sdk.kmskeyid.md) | kms key identifier |
